New Records: Virat Kohli scored his 71st international century, matching Ricky Ponting's tally.
Bhuvneshwar Kumar took a five-wicket haul in a T20I match.
Key Match Events: Virat Kohli's unbeaten 122, his first T20I century since November 2019.
The match result where India won by 101 runs.
Post-Match Reflections: The win was seen as a high point for India despite their overall poor Asia Cup performance.
Afghanistan's poor performance in the Super 4 stage, having lost all three games.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was part of the Asia Cup 2022, which India ended on a high note despite not making it to the final.
Afghanistan's loss in the Super 4 stage after initial group stage wins.
